import "./intro.scss"; import Button from "@material-ui/core/Button"; import { init } from "ityped"; import { useEffect, useRef } from "react"; export default function Intro(darkMode) { const textRef = useRef(); useEffect(() => { init(textRef.current, { backDelay: 1500, backSpeed: 60, showCursor: true, strings: ["Developer"], }); }, []); return (

Hola, soy

Darwin Rogel

Software

); }
